name: onboarding-tool
description: Root package for the Onboarding Tool project

scripts.start:backend: concurrently "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/api-gateway" "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/user-service" "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/onboarding-service" "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/notification-service" "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/template-service" "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/integration-service" "npm run start --workspace backend/packages/analytics-service"
